title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in the StyledText widget with word wrap enabled, the widget is inefficiently redrawing the entire text area.
EB: The StyledText widget should only redraw the affected portion of the text area when the text is changed with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a StyledText widget with word wrap enabled.
2. Add text to the widget.
3. Print the lineCount, paintY, and renderHeight values in the performPaint method of StyledText.
4. Change the text in the widget.
5. Observe the console output to see the excessive redraws occurring.
